description: Apple may see another charge sheet from the EU antitrust watchdogs unless it quickly fixes alleged violations of a new digital law. By 2026, the iPhone-maker needs to allow developers to inform customers of cheaper deals away from the App Store. If unheeded, that step would then pave the way for new fines under the bloc’s Digital Markets Act (DMA).
title: Apple Risks Fresh EU Charge Sheet Over App Store Curbs

description: Bitget plans to educate over 3,00,000 individuals across eight countries, including India, Brazil, Malaysia, and Morocco among others, in partnership with UNICEF Luxembourg . "Bitget Academy", the educational arm of exchange, will create a training module teaching how to create video games using the blockchain technology.
title: Bitget Partners UNICEF Unit to Expand Blockchain Training Across India, Other Countries

description: TikTok is rolling out a set of new AI advertising features. With these, marketers will be able to upload an image of a product they want to feature, or write a short text prompt and TikTok’s AI tools will produce various five-second clips that can then be used in an ad.
title: TikTok Pushes Deeper Into AI-Generated Video Ads With New Tools

description: ElevenLabs announced the language expansion of its latest artificial intelligence (AI) text-to-speech (TTS) model last week. With this expansion, the AI model now supports 41 new languages, taking the total count to 70 supported languages. The New York City-based AI startup said that with this expansion, the model is now accessible to 90 percent of the global population.
title: ElevenLabs Expands Eleven V3 Text-to-Speech Model With Support for 41 New Languages

description: Vivo started teasing the India launch of the T4 Lite 5G. It will come as a successor to last year’s Vivo T3 Lite 5G and is confirmed to feature a 6,000mAh battery, which is claimed to be the largest in the under Rs. 10,000 segment. The Vivo T4 Lite 5G is confirmed to offer 1,000 nits peak brightness.
title: Vivo T4 Lite 5G India Launch Confirmed; Battery Capacity, Price Range Teased

description: WhatsApp has finally been spotted working on a document scanning feature for Android, six months after it was introduced on WhatsApp for iOS. This allows users to scan and send documents directly within the app as media attachments. Last week, WhatsApp starting rolling out a message summarisation feature on a recent version of WhatsApp beta for Android.
title: WhatsApp Reportedly Working on Ability to Scan Documents on Android Smartphones

description: Microsoft released the latest Windows 11 Insider Preview build to the Dev channel last week. The new update brings two new artificial intelligence (AI) features to users. First is the introduction of AI agents in Windows 11, which can now autonomously find and execute changes in the Settings menu based on user prompts.
title: Microsoft Begins Testing AI Agents in Windows 11, Brings Option to Share Recall Snapshots in Europe

description: Oppo Reno 14 5G series will launch globally soon. A landing page for the lineup has gone live on Oppo's global website also revealing the imminent global launch of the Oppo Watch X2 Mini, Enco Buds 3 and Pad SE. The exact launch date has not yet been confirmed. The Reno 14 5G series is expected to include the base Reno 14 and Reno 14 Pro variants. The global variants are likely to be similar to their Chinese counterparts.
title: Oppo Reno 14 5G Series Global Launch Teased Alongside Watch X2 Mini, Enco Buds 3 and Pad SE

description: Tecno Pova 7 5G series will launch in India soon. While an exact launch date is still under wraps, Flipkart has started teasing the new series through its website. The upcoming lineup is likely to include at least four smartphones: Tecno Pova 7 5G, Pova 7 Pro 5G, Pova 7 Ultra 5G, and Pova 7 Neo.
title: Tecno Pova 7 5G Series India Launch Teased; Confirmed to Be Available on Flipkart

description: CD Projekt Red has said it will be "extremely challenging" to get The Witcher 4 to run at 60fps on the Xbox Series S. The studio showcased an Unreal Engine 5 tech demo of the game earlier this month that was running at 60fps on a base PS5.
title: The Witcher 4 Will Target 60 FPS on Consoles, but Series S Will Be 'Extremely Challenging' Says CD Projekt Red

description: While watchOS 26, like Apple’s other upcoming operating systems previewed at WWDC 2025, features a refreshed Liquid glass interface, it is also said to bring a major new feature. Called Custom Controls, it allows Apple Watch users to add and modify toggles in the Control Center for the first time.
title: watchOS 26 to Bring Control Center Customisation Options with User-Defined Toggles

description: Apple is expected to register a double-digit growth of more than 20 percent in the second quarter of this year, shipping upwards of 2.8 million iPhone units. As per a report, this growth is despite the anticipated downturn in the Indian smartphone market due to seasonal slowdown as well as the ongoing heat waves in several key regions.
title: Apple to Ship 2.8 Million iPhone Units in India in Q2 2025 Despite Seasonal Slowdown, Heat Wave: Report

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 0.95 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered minor gains on Monday, June 16. Solana, Cardano, Chainlink, and Avalanche are also trading in profits. Whereas, Dogecoin joined Tron and Shiba Inu in seeing losses.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Edges Past $106,000 in Modest Recovery; Altcoins See Gains

description: X showed signs of recovery on Saturday after an outage disrupted access for thousands of users in the US. Earlier in March, Elon Musk had blamed a cyberattack after a similar outage at X.
title: Elon Musk's X Sees Partial Recovery After Outage Hits US Users, Downdetector Shows

description: The Justice Department's antitrust officials are examining whether Google's proposed $32 billion (roughly Rs. 2,75,441 crore) purchase of cybersecurity firm Wiz could unlawfully restrict market competition. The review, which is in its early stages, could last months more. It will ultimately determine whether US officials let the deal proceed.
title: Google’s Plan to Buy Security Firm Wiz Gets Antitrust Review

description: Hisense U7Q Mini-LED TV was launched in India on Monday. It comes in screen size options ranging from 55-inch to 100-inch. The TV is powered by VIDAA Smart OS and comes with built-in digital assistants. It supports a 4K resolution with up to 144Hz refresh rate and VRR technology. Hisense has equipped the U7Q Mini-LED TV with a built-in subwoofer and two-speaker setup.
title: Hisense U7Q Mini-LED TV With 144Hz Gaming Support, Built-in Subwoofer Launched in India

description: Lenovo Legion Pro 7i has been launched in India, with an Intel Core Ultra 9 HX CPU and Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs. The laptop features a 16-inch OLED screen with 500 nits peak brightness. It is equipped with a 99Wh battery and ships with Windows 11. Here's everything you need to know about the Lenovo Legion Pro 7i.
title: Lenovo Legion Pro 7i (2025) With Intel Core Ultra 9 HX CPU, Up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 GPU Launched

description: Meta has internally promoted Arun Srinivas to lead its India operations starting next month. At present, Srinivas currently heads the tech giant's India ads business, according to his LinkedIn profile.
title: Meta Appoints Arun Srinivas as India Head

description: Nintendo Switch 2 sold over 1.1 million units in its launch week ending June 7 in the US, data from Circana showed. The console has set a record for all-time launch week units sold for video game systems in the US, beating Sony's PS4.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Sets All-Time Launch Week Sales Record in the US, Beating Sony's PS4

description: OnePlus Nord 5 series, including a base and a Nord CE 5 variant, will launch in India on July 8 at 2pm IST, the company revealed in a press release. The handsets will be joined by the OnePlus Buds 4 TWS earphones. They will be available for purchase in the country via the official e-store and Amazon.
title: OnePlus Nord 5, Nord CE 5, and Buds 4 India Launch Date Set for July 8; Key Features, Availability Revealed

description: OpenAI added new capabilities to Canvas and Projects in ChatGPT last week. The San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm is now letting users download the content within a Canvas in multiple file types. Additionally, when writing code in Canvas, users will be able to export it in the relevant file type.
title: OpenAI Makes Canvas in ChatGPT Downloadable, Adds New Capabilities to Projects

description: Oppo K13 Turbo Pro is said to be in the works. It is tipped to come with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset and a 6.8-inch display. The gaming-focused phone could feature a dual rear camera unit headlined by a 50-megapixel primary sensor and is said to offer RGB lighting.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo Pro Key Specifications Leaked; Could Be Equipped With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC

description: Poco F7 may launch globally as well as in India on June 25. It will be available via Flipkart and is expected to be priced around Rs. 30,000. The phone could carry a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC and a 50-megapixel Sony IMX882 primary rear sensor. It will likely sport a 6.83-inch AMOLED display, an aluminium middle frame and a glass back panel. The Indian variant of the Poco F7 is confirmed to have a 7,550mAh battery.
title: Poco F7 Launch Date and Price in India Leaked; Design, Key Features Tipped Again

description: Vivo X200 FE is confirmed to launch in Malaysia soon. It is teased to come in four different colour options and confirmed to have a 12GB RAM + 512GB storage variant. It is currently listed for pre-orders in Malaysia through the company website. The handset is likely to run on MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC.
title: Vivo X200 FE Confirmed to Launch Soon in Global Markets; Pre-Reservations Begin

description: Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro will launch China launch this week, and the company has started to tease its key specifications. It will feature Xiaomi's in-house XRING O1 SoC, and a massive 12,160mAh battery with 120W fast charging. It is also expected to offer compatibility with the Xiaomi Smart Pen and a keyboard accessory, and could run on HyperOS 2.0 with Android 15.
title: Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro Launch Date, Key Specifications Including XRING O1 Chip Revealed

description: Apple will release the public beta for AirPods for the first time in July. It will be rolled out for the AirPods 4 and AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) models, enabling those who are not registered Apple developers to try out the new features. Users can submit feedback to Apple via the Feedback Assistant app.
title: Apple to Release First Public Beta Update for AirPods 4 and AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) in July

description: NASA, Axiom Space, and SpaceX have rescheduled Axiom Mission 4 to June 19, 2025, following promising leak repairs on the ISS and SpaceX’s successful resolution of a rocket fuel leak. The four-member crew includes astronauts from the U.S., India, Poland, and Hungary. Final confirmation is pending additional evaluations aboard the space station.
title: Axiom-4 Mission Launch Carrying Indian Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla Set for June 19

description: Boat SmartRing Active Plus has been launched in India with a price tag of Rs. 2,999. It comes in six different sizes. The wearable has a list of sensors that help to monitor heart rate and blood oxygen saturation (SpO2). The SmartRing Active Plus is available in three shades.
title: Boat SmartRing Active Plus With SpO2 Monitoring, Heart Rate Tracking Launched in India

description: Gemini Code Assist, an artificial intelligence (AI) coding platform by Google, is now receiving the capabilities of the Gemini 2.5 Pro model. The company recently announced that the latest Gemini model will improve certain coding-related features of the platform. Additionally, the tech giant is also releasing two new personalisation features and three chat interface-based features.
title: Google Adds New Features to Gemini Code Assist, Integrates Gemini 2.5 Pro Capabilities

description: Audio Overviews are now coming to Google Search, thanks to a new Search Labs experiment. The tech giant announced the new feature on Friday, highlighting that select users will see artificial intelligence (AI) audio conversations on certain results pages. Notably, Google recently added Audio Overviews to the Gemini app and website.
title: Google Tests AI-Powered Audio Overviews in Search Results for Certain Queries

description: Oppo K13x 5G will launch in India on June 23 at 12pm IST, the company confirmed in a press release. The handset will come with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, a 6,000mAh battery with 45W SuperVOOC charging support and a 50-megapixel AI-backed dual rear camera unit. It will be priced in the country under Rs. 15,000 and will be exclusively available via Flipkart.
title: Oppo K13x 5G India Launch Date Set for June 23; Price Range, Key Features Revealed

description: Google Pixel 10 series will introduce a new AI feature called "Magic Cue", according to leaked screenshots. This AI-powered feature is expected to offer contextual suggestions based on smartphone activity, enabling quick access to information from various Google services and device screenshots. Magic Cue could arrive on the Google Pixel 10 with the fifth-generation Tensor G5 chip, that is expected to debut later this year.
title: Google Pixel 10 Could Debut With Magic Cue AI Feature That Suggests Actions Based on App Usage

description: Realme Narzo 80 Lite 5G was launched in India on Monday. The phone is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC paired with 6GB of RAM, and it ships with Android 15-based Realme UI 6.0. It carries a 6,000mAh battery and measures 7.94mm in thickness. The handset comes with an IP64-rated dust and splash-resistant build and a MIL-STD-810H military-grade durability certification.
title: Realme Narzo 80 Lite 5G With 6,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: The ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X handhelds are planned for launch in select markets in Holiday 2025. A games industry tipster has shared details about pricing, pre-orders and launch window for the two devices.
title: ROG Xbox Ally Pre-Orders to Reportedly Begin in August; European Pricing Tipped

description: Google Pixel 10 series could receive improved speakers. A new report claims that they will be the best speakers ever on a Pixel phone, though without Dolby Atmos support. The new lineup is expected to go official on August 13 and is expected to include Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold models.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Said to Offer Improved Audio With Upgraded Speakers

description: Vivo Y400 Pro 5G will launch in India on June 20. The handset is claimed to be the slimmest phone in the segment with a 3D curved display. It is expected to measure 7.4mm in thickness and sport a 6.77-inch 3D curved AMOLED screen with 4,500 nits peak brightness. The Y400 Pro 5G may be priced in the Rs. 25,000 segment. It is tipped to get a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit and a 5,500mAh battery with 90W charging support.
title: Vivo Y400 Pro 5G India Launch Date Set for June 20; Design Revealed

description: With iOS 26, Apple has introduced a new API which lets third-party music apps display animated artwork on the iPhone's lock screen. The apps can display a preview file as a placeholder whilst the video file loads, and display it afterwards. The feature is present in the developer SDK following the release of iOS 26 Developer Beta 1 update.
title: iPhone’s Lock Screen Will Display Animated Artwork from Third-Party Music Apps With iOS 26: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 are expected to get several upgrades this year. As per a tipster, the tech giant will tease new Gemini Live features at its Galaxy Unpacked event. Further, an improved main camera, a new cover screen, and Galaxy AI offerings on the Galaxy Z Fold 7 could also be highlighted.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 Said to Get New Gemini Live Features, Upgrades
